Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: If you didn't know, you can't groom when it's a above freezing, so if you expected good skating conditions or amazing tracks at Huron Meadows today , you were sorely disappointed ??. But it was awesome to break trail on my waxless classic touring skis with Sarah and Tony around the lake and the contractor's loop! Big smiles just getting out in the woods!

nubsNob.xcTrails: Please access the XC trails from Valley road during snowmaking. The upper trails are groomed and in great shape.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is closed today so that we can concentrate on snowmaking. We will be open daily beginning Friday, December 12. The Snow Crew is making exceptional progress and we plan to have all of the frontside and southside runs open this Friday which will bring our run count to over 30 runs. Pintail Peak will open by the following weekend. Thanks for skiing at Nub's Nob.
